title: Sex - Requiem Obituary For Doctor Daniel Amneus.pdf
description:
Daniel Amneus, Ph D, was professor of English (Emeritus) at California State University in Los Angeles. His specialty was Shakespearean textual criticism.  Upon his retirement he took to looking at the state of affairs between men, women and children in the USA.

He found it lacking, and wrote several books.


Back to patriarchy
The Case for Father Custody
The Garbage Generation
Mystery of Macbeth
Three Othellos


This is his obituary.

 
REQUIEM FOR DR. DANIEL AMNEUS

By Robert Lindsay Cheney Jr.

January 8, 2004

I am quiescent and circumspect. Sad and reposed.

I just received news that my mentor, the honorable Dr. Daniel Amneus passed away just last month on December 18th, 2003. Like a somber mid-December storm, a great passing has occurred in this nation, quietly, and without fanfare. Like a dark rain, something important has passed us all, in profound silence. But that passing has meant something. I hope to put the words here to show who and what this man was, and what he had accomplished.
